participant_1.background:
My worst fear is that my flower garden will be destroyed.
I focus on my personal growth and don't feel the need to share it with others.
I wake up and immediately check the weather to see if it's a good day for a run.
I hope my friends and family are doing well.
I can work all day as long as I have my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I am a proud American who loves to drink coffee and create content for my YouTube channel.
i like music.
I find comfort in my friends and family.
i am currently unemployed so i have time to write.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.

content.text: Morning! It's going good, thanks for asking! Just got done writing a blog post for my YouTube channel.
It's about my life as a proud American and my love of coffee.
Cool! I love coffee too. Do you make your own?
I sure do! I love the process of making it and it's always better when I make it myself.
Me too! It's so much more rewarding. I love getting to choose the beans and grind them myself.
Exactly! And I love being able to control the strength of the coffee.
What's your favorite type of coffee?
I love a good cup of French press coffee. It's so smooth and delicious.
French press is my favorite too! I love the way it makes the coffee taste.
It's the best! What kind of beans do you like to use?
I usually use a medium roast, but I like to switch it up every now and then.
I love trying new beans too! It's so fun to find new flavors.
It is! I love the way coffee can change my mood.
It really can! It's the best way to start my day.
Me too! I always feel more energized and focused after I have a cup of coffee.
